EmailTemplate.subject: Your Application for an On Demand Savings Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName}
Assalamu Alaikum
Thank you for applying for our On Demand Savings Account.
The documents for you to fill in, sign and return to us have been sent to you in the post.
Once the documentation has been returned to us, your account will be opened subject to further application checks.
Further information on how you can use your account can be found via the following link:
http://www.islamic-bank.com/personal-banking/savings-products/demand-savings-account/
This link will take you through to the Islamic Bank of Britain website where you will find all the relevant information about the product.
Please ensure that you have read the attached documents before signing and returning your application form:
Consumer Banking Terms and Conditions On Demand Savings Account Special Conditions Proof of Identity Leaflet
If you have any queries regarding your account or need further information then please call our Customer Helpline on 0800 4080 786.
Yours sincerely
Jim Madden Contact Centre Manager
For information on our Home Purchase Plan (the Halal Mortgage alternative), please call 0800 4087 786.
Please do not reply to this email as the return mailbox is not monitored. If you wish to contact us, please call our Customer Helpline on 0800 4080 786.
